topics.title: Describe Your Feelings About the World
topics.prompt: Describe how you feel about the world using words like laughter, tears, hope, and sorrow.
topics.hint: 請描述你對世界的感受，可以提及喜悅、悲傷、希望或失落，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: I think the world is full of different emotions. Sometimes people feel happy and laugh, and other times they feel sad or cry. But hope always helps us keep going. The world is a place of many feelings.

topics.title: Share a Time You Felt Friendship
topics.prompt: Talk about a moment when you felt true friendship or kindness from someone.
topics.hint: 請分享一次你感受到友情或善意的經歷，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: Once, a friend helped me when I was feeling lonely. They smiled and listened to me. That moment made me feel very happy and loved.

topics.title: Explain What 'A Small World' Means to You
topics.prompt: Explain what the phrase 'a small world' means to you and why.
topics.hint: 解釋「小小的世界」這個詞對你的意義，可以提到世界的連結或距離，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: To me, 'a small world' means that we are all connected. Even if people live far away, we can still understand each other. The world feels smaller because of friendship and love.

topics.title: Describe a Place You Love in Nature
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite natural place, such as a mountain or ocean, and why you like it.
topics.hint: 描述你喜歡的自然景點，包括山、海或其它地方，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: I love the beach because the ocean is beautiful and peaceful. I enjoy listening to the waves and feeling the warm sun on my skin. Nature makes me feel relaxed and happy.

topics.title: Talk About Moments of Happiness and Sadness
topics.prompt: Describe a happy moment and a sad moment in your life and how you dealt with them.
topics.hint: 描述你經歷過的快樂和悲傷時刻，以及你是如何面對的，說 4～6 句。
topics.sample: I was very happy when I graduated from school. It was a proud moment. But I felt sad when my pet got sick. I talked to my family and they helped me feel better.

topics.title: Imagine a Day Without Sorrows
topics.prompt: Imagine a day where nobody feels sorrow. Describe what that day would be like.
topics.hint: 想像一個沒有人悲傷的日子，描述當天會是什麼樣子，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: If there was a day without sorrow, everyone would smile all day. People would help each other and feel happy. The world would feel peaceful and full of love.

topics.title: Tell a Story About Friendship and Love
topics.prompt: Create a short story about friendship and love between two people or groups.
topics.hint: 講一個有關友情與愛的小故事，大約 5 句。
topics.sample: Two friends met in a new city. They shared laughs and helped each other. Their friendship grew stronger every day. They showed love to everyone around them.

topics.title: Describe How People Around the World Are Connected
topics.prompt: Explain how people from different countries can be friends and help each other.
topics.hint: 說明不同國家的人如何成為朋友並互相幫助，說 4～6 句。
topics.sample: People from different countries can be friends by sharing their stories and cultures. They can help each other by working together. Technology and travel make the world smaller and bring us closer.

topics.title: Share Your Hopes for the World
topics.prompt: Talk about your hopes for the future of the world.
topics.hint: 分享你對未來世界的期望，可以包含和平、愛和幸福，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: I hope the world becomes a place where everyone is kind and peaceful. I want people to care about each other and the environment. I believe love can make the world better.

topics.title: Describe the Meaning of Laughter in Life
topics.prompt: Explain why laughter is important in life and how it affects people.
topics.hint: 說明笑的重要性，以及它如何影響人們的心情，說 3～5 句。
topics.sample: Laughter is important because it makes us feel happy and relaxed. It can bring friends closer and help us forget problems for a while. Laughing makes life more enjoyable.
